website_summaries.verdict: This bike doesn't come with a lot of bells and whistles, but it's the one to get if you are watching your wallet – a BMX model for those on a budget.
pros: A classic BMX design for fraction of the price of competitors
Basic but offers a smooth ride and good looking red and black finish
cons: Design is more suited for boys
A few owners received models with flaws, including bad tires and bent frames

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great bike! Easy to put together! My son loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Takes Hours
customer_reviews.text: What was supposed to take 45 min or so took hours. Then the chain popped off and no matter how hard I tried, it wouldn't go back on. Returning it and getting a replacement. Honestly, it would have been so much better to get a bike from Walmart and get them to assemble it. This was a horrible experience and the manual is crap. EDIT: *The replacement came in a few days! This time around, things went much quicker; maybe about 45 minutes. But I did have to buy the tools on my own so that's something that could have been said before. And the brakes are pedal brakes, not hand brakes. Other than that, it's good!
customer_reviews.author: Birukti

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a good bike
customer_reviews.text: Pretty simple to put together but took a bit of figuring out for a first-timer like me since it didn't come with instructions. All you have to do is put on the handlebars, seat, and front wheel, and screw in the pedals. The bike seems solid. The handlebars are a good distance from the seat unlike some of the bikes I've seen that have them too far apart (in my opinion).
customer_reviews.author: J. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: ... get the pedals threaded on right but its a good bike.
customer_reviews.text: took a little strength and elbow grease to get the pedals threaded on right but its a good bike...not one thing wrong with it i relubed the whole system including the crank assembly that connects to the chain to push the bike with strike industries anti venom XPLC gun lube and it is sooo much smoother than the garbage factory grease it comes with clean that garbage off.
customer_reviews.author: Grunt

customer_reviews.title: Great bike for 6-8 yr. old
customer_reviews.text: This bike went together very easily. I actually put it together while in the middle of something else and it was cake. My son loves it and it adjust really well for the 6-8 year sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best BMX-style bike for under $100
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't too sure what to expect when this bike arrived. I read reviews about missing parts, scratched parts, and/or defective parts. Thankfully none of these applied to my order. All of the parts were in the box and the bike was free of blemishes and defects. It was easy to assemble and it looks great. My son said that it goes fast and it's easy for him to ride. Overall, he loves it and that's all I care about!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bike
customer_reviews.text: Got this for our son. He was outgrowing his old one. He is about to be 7years old in 2 month. He will be able to grow into this bike and use it until he is about 9-10. He loves his new big boy bike (especially that it has a kickstand)
customer_reviews.author: Demazie

customer_reviews.title: Frustrated mama
customer_reviews.text: My son got this bike less than a year ago for his birthday, he's used it just as any kid would and it is ruined. He hasnt been rough on it or treated it poorly. The whole pedal system has come completely apart and we really arent sure if its fixable. Bikes should last more than a year, AT LEAST. The bike looks nice, but with normal use, it wasnt built to last.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah P.

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Value for the new rider!
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased for my 8 year old. Arrived in the time promised and was easy to put together (about 30 mins by myself). All you have to assemble are the pedals, seat, handle bar and front wheel. This is a well made bike for the price point, and both myself and my son are very pleased. The only hold back from 5 stars is a few minor scratches due to insufficient packaging I beleive. This is a terrific value for anyone looking for simple bike without several gears or brakes.
customer_reviews.author: lausten

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money. This bike arrived with a defective fork for the front tire. We were told that it would take 2 month for another part to arrive and that the part would vary in color. Family member was able to stretch the fork and get the tire set (at his garage with necessary equipment). After two days of riding the tire went bald and popped while my son was breaking. The kick stand is also poorly constructed and rattled when he would ride. Don’t waste your money or time waiting for this bike to arrive.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Great Bike
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this bike - he's 9. It practically comes put together in the box, it took practically 10 minutes to put together and he was off. It's sturdy and built well. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Rosario

customer_reviews.title: Good inital Christmas buy, but tire busted after a couple of weeks of riding
customer_reviews.text: Really excited to purchase the bike and love the look. It arrived in a nice box and was okay to assemble. Took a couple hours. Purchased this for my 6 year old at Christmas and couldn't wait to ride this spring. Literally, had 2 bike rides on this during this month and the tire is completely busted. Not flat, but completely detached from the frame which could have led to a severe accident admist this COV19 pandemic. Thankfully, my son is okay - bike is done.
customer_reviews.author: Fitmama1

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional Value
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new bike for my 6 1/2 year old, as he had outgrown his 16" wheel bike. At ~$75, we couldn't pass this up. It arrived quickly, assembled a few pieces (~15 minutes) in no time and I (a 6'5" 200lb dad) test drove it. Super-sturdy construction, works great, and most importantly my son LOVES it!! Would buy again 10/10 times.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This is such an excellent value for the price! The bike was super easy to put together. You’ll need metric wrenches. It’s beautiful and sturdy and very heavy. My 7 year old is just thrilled. The instructions were clear and simple. Most of it is put together, you just need to screw on the front wheel, handlebars, seat, and pedals.
customer_reviews.author: Nauip

customer_reviews.title: I was very happy to get such a bike at this price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bike for my son, who will be in the third grade this year. His previous 18 inches were given to his sister.I was very surprised when I received the bike, I didn't see it was a refurbished bike, it was perfect, there was no friction, I was very happy to get such a bike at this price.
customer_reviews.author: XC

customer_reviews.title: Nice bike
customer_reviews.text: Great bike for my son. Only thing I would change is the seat. When my son rides for too long his bottom is in pain. So we will be switching the seat out soon. Otherwise it's a great little bike. My son is 9 yrs old 80 lbs. It's perfect for his little body. Thx again seller
customer_reviews.author: 💰Ms.MoneyBags💰

customer_reviews.title: Count on replacing the rear bearing
customer_reviews.text: These bikes either come with a bad rear bearing or the quickly fail. They are available for replacement if you can take the time to do that job. If the shipper double boxes this bike it will arrive undamaged. If just a single box is used, it will arrive a mess.
customer_reviews.author: VerifiedReviewer

customer_reviews.title: have the rider there to set up seat and handle bars for a good fit
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my grandson he had never had a bike with rear brake only. I had to buy a new tire the first week with him learning how to leave black marks on the road he loves it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice bike!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a donation to a family within the Adopt a Family organization during the holidays. It was a very nice bike for the price and was donated with a new helmet (also bought on Amazon.) We hope it brings many years of bicycling enjoyment!
customer_reviews.author: Purple Dahila

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and good quality
customer_reviews.text: My son adores this bike, after riding a couple different bikes from other companies. He feels he is able to go faster, haha, so he is happy. It seems very sturdy and rides smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn L.

customer_reviews.title: My son loves his bike
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this bike can't get him off of it Got it for him for a birthday present he set it up with his Uncle and he hasn't gotten off of it since He loves the color the ride is easy hes even trying to do tricks now
customer_reviews.author: lacey

customer_reviews.title: Great looking bike!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this bike for our Angle Tree Child. He is 10 years old and I know he is going to love this bike. It is a very nice looking bike and my husband said it easy to put together. Thank you so much for helping us make a child happy!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Smith

customer_reviews.title: Solid nice looking bike!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and their girl bike for a fundraiser toys for tots. Packed very well double boxed and padded it arrived in perfect condition. Easy to assemble handlebar, petals and seat. It's wonderful to give hope the kids like them.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Heim

customer_reviews.title: Chain falls off. Customer Support tried and failed. Ultimately, got bike to work.
customer_reviews.text: The crank was so wobbly that the chain would not stay on when my son rode it. I contacted Dynacraft support, and they were kind enough to send me a new crank assembly. I had trouble finding instructions on how to put it on. Once I started putting it on, I realized that they had sent the wrong size parts for the bike. I then undid the original crank and put it back on, and everything was fine. From what I can tell, they didn't tighten something enough during the original crank installation. The bike works fine now.
customer_reviews.author: Dorian Collier

customer_reviews.title: Magna Bike is Ok
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson. It's a good looking bike and is sturdy and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Sincler

customer_reviews.title: An ok bike for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these bikes for both my kids. One child loves it (which is my daughter. She wanted a boys bike) but my son doesn’t care for this bike very much. He said it’s too tough to pedal but we’ve adjusted it so idk what else could be the issue. I think it’s just preference with my son
customer_reviews.author: LenaBean

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy for the price
customer_reviews.text: Our six year old grandson loves his new bike. He rides it all the time and does tricks on it!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy L.

customer_reviews.title: My grandson loves it! Great value, easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I should have made a video of me putting this together. It was really easy and the directions were easy to follow. You need your own tools and it took me about an hour to uncrate and put it all together.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price especially
customer_reviews.text: The first one arrived with a punctured inner-tube in the rear tire, we got a replacement one and seems great so far.
customer_reviews.author: Melissag

customer_reviews.title: My nephew says this bike is the greatest!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My nephew loves his new bike he told me it's the greatest! It is sturdy and well made and was very reasonably priced. It is a very good product and I would buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: D. E. Strothers

customer_reviews.title: Great bike for the money
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bike. I gave it to my kid for Christmas and he got in love with it. Looks good and it was easy to put it together.
customer_reviews.author: Richard G.

customer_reviews.title: Pedal broke off after less than 8 months of very light use
customer_reviews.text: My eight-year-old son rides this bike a few times a month going to/from a playground 3 blocks away from our home. We purchased in March 2019, and last night (November 2019) while biking across the street, the pedal completely fell off. My son fell down and hit the pavement hard, and it doesn't look like there's anything we can do to fix the pedal so we'll be trashing this bike:(
customer_reviews.author: Checkoff2020

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Package just arrived. It seems to be a decent bike for the price, but the decals were wrinkled in a couple spots and the seat clamp was missing altogether. Had to order one separately and thank goodness it'll be here before Easter. I had to try to smooth the decals down as best I could but the wrinkles are still visible.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah B.

customer_reviews.title: Basic bike, good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: For the price this is a decent bike. It's a little "bare bones" but that's probably my fault for not paying attention to accessories listed. It came mostly assembled in the box so assembly was fast and straightforward. For a kid that doesn't ride every day this bike should suffice.
customer_reviews.author: Amy LaRee Liles

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great bike! My son rides it everywhere and gets plenty of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Ward

customer_reviews.title: Tough, great quality bike!!!
customer_reviews.text: My son LOVES this bike! Looks tough on it! Rides well! Good quality for a low price!
customer_reviews.author: Trin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our 8 year old grandson
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our 8 year old grandson. The price is good too because we didn't want to spend too much for a bike that would be at our home.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Kutzner

customer_reviews.title: Great value and great bicycle for 9yo
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old son got this as a Christmas gift and absolutely loves it! He rises in the warmth and cold weather. We got a bell and he rings that bell up and down the sidewalk. Great buy!!! Took my husband about 15-20 minutes to assemble and add a bow for under the tree.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it
customer_reviews.text: This is a boys boys bike. This is tough and durable for boys being boys.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Moczo

customer_reviews.title: Thank  you
customer_reviews.text: Love the bike. Came very quickly easy to put together and rides smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Xxxxx

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: The chain keeps falling off, already rusting. poor quality for a bike.
customer_reviews.author: Paula A. Linard

customer_reviews.title: Ask Your wife first
customer_reviews.text: Got:this for my neighbors kid...put it together and he loggers it
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely terrible. The bolts that is on the back wheel is striped so the chain can not be changed. The chain in continuously popping and the break didn't even come. I cant return because it will cost more than the bike itself. My son is very disappointed and I will not buy from this again. I wish I can give a 0 star rating
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Check for ALL parts
customer_reviews.text: The bike itself is great. There were missing parts so I had to go to a store and buy them so we could use the bike.
customer_reviews.author: Angi

customer_reviews.title: This bike is poorly made
customer_reviews.text: The front sprocket is mis-formed, which means the chain is too tight at times and too loose at others. When it is too loose, the chain comes off easily. It comes off so often that my child cannot ride it, even around the block. The return window is closed so I can't even send it back. DO NOT BUY THIS BIKE.
customer_reviews.author: Scott C.

customer_reviews.title: Great for an 8 year old
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my son and he loves it. It is sturdy and it was easy to assemble. The size is great for an 8 year old.
customer_reviews.author: TIG

customer_reviews.title: A great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Santa brought this for my eight year old and he was ecstatic. It came in a ginirmous box but it was easy to put together. The instructions were clear and thorough.
customer_reviews.author: the Fisters

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bike for an 8 year old and he loved it. I was a little big for him but he was still able to ride the bike safely. It was easy to assemble and looks good.
customer_reviews.author: P Burke

customer_reviews.title: Just right for the price
customer_reviews.text: The bike arrived in good order: all parts included and in good shape. Assembly was not difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Fan Chongyi

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice bike and the colors are bright. Better than any walmart brand.
customer_reviews.author: Trish Carey

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: My boys had been enjoying the bikes for at least 1 year now. They seem to hold quite well. But then the price is comparable to what you would otherwise find at Walmart too.
customer_reviews.author: Cip

customer_reviews.title: Good bike
customer_reviews.text: All in all a really good bike and a great price only issue is it’s a little heavy for that younger person
customer_reviews.author: bradb

customer_reviews.title: He has only had a short time to ride it but the steering wheel seems to loosen easily but will update if it improves as he rides ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bike for my son who was transitioning into a bigger bike but bought this bike to have it come with missing parts and no instructions! Amazon thankfully replaced the bike with no charge but when receiving the new bike the box had been opened and just 1 part missing.... He has only had a short time to ride it but the steering wheel seems to loosen easily but will update if it improves as he rides more!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Build Quality make bike nearly useless.
customer_reviews.text: The front fork was delivered with such poor tolerances that the wheel could not be installed properly. The tire would rub against the fork if the wheel was placed where it was supposed to be. The alignment of the bike was so far off, it was both odd to look at and tough to ride. Cheap? Yes? Crappy? Yes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bike
customer_reviews.text: The chain broke the first time my grandson used it
customer_reviews.author: Heidi A Agostino

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This bike is terrible! My son has ridden it probably 10 times and every time the chain comes off. It was a complete waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice bike.
customer_reviews.text: My Grandson loves his new bike. My son said it was pretty easy to out together. My Grandson is 5 1/2 years old and he rides it great.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Nice kids bike
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly never looked at instructions since it comes largly preassembled so it only took 20min to be on the street riding.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: The car didn't run smoothly.
customer_reviews.text: The car is not smooth and often gets stuck when riding.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. Seat had a couple punctures likely from the shipping/packaging inside the box.
customer_reviews.author: J. Kerper

customer_reviews.title: Too big for a 7 year old
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good bike but it’s too big for my 7 year old. Getting an 18 in. For him
customer_reviews.author: Sher

customer_reviews.title: Sleek, slim and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: This bike it everything I wanted it to be. We have adopted a young boy for Christmas this year and this will be his Christmas surprise! It was very simple to assemble. It looks perfect! We have it, along with a nice helmet to go with it! I can't wait for Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: A happy 11yr old
customer_reviews.text: My nephew was so excited to get this bike for Christmas! And i couldn’t beat the price! He loved it!!
customer_reviews.author: BrittBratt

customer_reviews.title: Bikes
customer_reviews.text: We order two of these for our twins. They were relatively easy to assemble. The boys loved them!
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha

customer_reviews.title: The bike is great, however
customer_reviews.text: The bike is great, however, the back tire was broken out of the box. The needle valve will not hold air and it keeps going flat while he’s riding.
customer_reviews.author: sarahbeth

customer_reviews.title: Riding like the wind in Texas
customer_reviews.text: My 12 year old daughter and 14 year old son assembled this bike.
customer_reviews.author: Sonya Rodezno

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: Save your money . The back wheel hub started to grind after only 2 rides. Because of the grind while pedaling it causes the chain to lock up sometimes when u are riding . Very poor quality in the main part which is the back hub and coaster brake.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Great to put together for a woman. My baby boy loved it
customer_reviews.author: Te J Harris

customer_reviews.title: Great bike for kids
customer_reviews.text: At first the kids thought it was too big but it wasn’t he rides all the time and he loves this bike
customer_reviews.author: bill adams

customer_reviews.title: Good bike for child
customer_reviews.text: Not bad bike for this price. Our child os happy.
customer_reviews.author: Bolat

customer_reviews.title: I bought use & very good condition
customer_reviews.text: The beauty of the bike was very clean & put together.
customer_reviews.author: Kalen Howell-Anderson

customer_reviews.title: it's a great bike, my 8 year old enjoys it
customer_reviews.text: For what I paid, it's a great bike, my 8 year old enjoys it. It's also not heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: He loves it
customer_reviews.text: The bike is awesome . We did have a missing part issue but amazon refunded us so we could order the part .
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Chewning

customer_reviews.title: Dynacraft Magna Throttle Boys BMX Street/Dirt Bike 20
customer_reviews.text: bike is great. easy to put together. son loves it..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Peace and Love
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old grandson loves this bicycle. Everything about it looks perfect and it was easy to complete the assembly. This bicycle is a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Norman Firenze

customer_reviews.title: Other than that it is fine.
customer_reviews.text: The back wheel was attached too tightly and is impossible for me to remove. So, I can't add training wheels. Other than that it is fine.
customer_reviews.author: s0nicfreak

customer_reviews.title: For the price an easy 5 star.
customer_reviews.text: Comes as advertised. Nice balance, good tires for on or off road. Plus coaster brakes, which are easier for my 8 year old to use then hand brakes. Simple and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Rose M.

customer_reviews.title: solid bike for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very solid kid bike for the price. Bought a 20" one for my 6 yr old and fits him well.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Everything was good except that the chain keep on falling all the time
customer_reviews.text: Product is ok but the chain keep on coming off al the time, it was really annoying but the worst part was that the park was near a lake with no fence, no chain no brakes.
customer_reviews.author: Jhon Days

customer_reviews.title: Defective part for Christmas ministry gift.
customer_reviews.text: The left pedal is warped and will not attach. Not sure what to do as this is a gift for a child through my church's Christmas ministry in 3 days. It is to be taken to another city.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: For the price very nice you have to adjust it when you get it ,it has a regulator on it .if you don't adjust it then it won't peddle fast
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Degnan

customer_reviews.title: Dynacraft Bike
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 7 yr old, and it’s great. Only complaint was threadings to put pedals on, difficult to line up and could be stripped easily if you don’t pay attention.
customer_reviews.author: Connor

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT waste your time and child heartache
customer_reviews.text: The bike came without a seat!! My kid was so upset that hr couldnt ride it after he had waited for 4 days to get it!. No instructions, the pedals dont screw in properly, and have plastic bolts on them which is the dumbest thing ever!
customer_reviews.author: Julena

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice bike for the price. Seems like it will hold up to several years of light use.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya S.

customer_reviews.title: Stay away
customer_reviews.text: Holy b**ls! Both wheels were bent upon receipt. This bike never rode smoothly for my 9 year old son. Very sad. Stay away from this brand
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son who is 6 year old as a Christmas present and he really like it. Exactly what we hoping for and I will recommend this seller to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Slimfry101

customer_reviews.title: Nice bike for the price!!!
customer_reviews.text: Nice bike haven't put it together yet its a Christmas gift for my son. All the reviews I read about it gave it the most excellent praise. I'm sure he's going to love it. Wonderful price also.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin Page

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: My son is 10 he put it together almost completely by himself with a little supervision and pointers. Great bike!! He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn White

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble however, the rear tire does not hold air.
customer_reviews.author: Lorrain

customer_reviews.title: Not if you plan to use training wheels.
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad bike. Cant use training wheels. Didn't fit my application. Sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: dan doherty

customer_reviews.title: Nice bike
customer_reviews.text: I gave this bicycle to my Grandson for Christmas and he loved it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: James M Hillcoat III

customer_reviews.title: Great bike
customer_reviews.text: This bike was so easy to put together. My son loves it
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Weak chain, cheap bike
customer_reviews.text: The chain link came apart two days after Christmas . also , the rim of the front tire bent and cracked which caused the tire to come off the rim.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Verrall

customer_reviews.title: It’s a great bike!
customer_reviews.text: My son ❤️❤️❤️Loves this bike he just got it for Christmas. It’s a great bike!
customer_reviews.author: Luv2Grm

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The bike came somewhat broken. Needed to fix it before I could put it together. Wasn't easy
customer_reviews.author: vivi

customer_reviews.title: SO much Fun!
customer_reviews.text: My son got this bike for Christmas and he loves it! The color is just what he wanted and it has held up well!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with a bent front fork, couldn't install front tire.
customer_reviews.author: Haznavy

customer_reviews.title: Great paint job
customer_reviews.text: My son adores this bike! Great paint job, and rides awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney Humble

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BIKE.. FOR 10YR GRANDSON
customer_reviews.text: GRANDSON LOVES IT Perfect for Nana's house NOT expensive.. great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Picky Mom

customer_reviews.title: It worked out fine though as I did have the tools available
customer_reviews.text: The assembly wasn't too hard, but they didin't include any of the tools to assemble it, which every other bike I have ever ordered did. It worked out fine though as I did have the tools available. My son LOVED the bike and really enjoyed riding it for 2 weeks. Then he started having problems with the chain. The part of the bike that the pedals are attached to seemed to be loose, and the chain also rubbed against the plastic piece that it was next whenever he braked. I have requested a return, and am still debating whether to re-order this bike or go for a different one.
customer_reviews.author: LL

product_meta.title: Dynacraft Magna Throttle Boys BMX Street/Dirt Bike 20", Black/Red/White
product_meta.description: The Magna Throttle Boys BMX Street/Dirt 20" Bike is perfect for the street and off road. This versatile boys bike features BMX styling with amazing lines and color combinations. The steel black frame and rims are accented by bold red and white graphics. This bike features a cross bar/handle bar pad, an adjustable saddle seat, coaster brakes, and a kick stand which makes parking the bike a breeze. The Magna Throttle also has tire and front and rear body reflectors to provide improved visibility at night.
feature_bullets: Boys BMX street/dirt bike with coaster brakes
Lifetime warranty on frame and fork
Recommended Ages 6 to 10; up to 105 lbs.
Bike Dimensions 35" x 26" x 54", 26.95 pounds.Tire Size: 20 inch x 1.95 inch
